short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Qtum light wallet and transaction signing client, support QiSwap.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QiWallet is a light wallet and transaction signing client for decentralized apps (dapps) for the Qtum blockchain. 

- Send and receive QTUM and other QRC20 Tokens.
- Sign transactions sent from decentralized apps

Created by QiWallet development team.
